summary: Full-Stack Developer with practical experience building responsive frontends and RESTful backends. Skilled in React, Next.js, AngularJS, and backend services using Node.js, Django, and FastAPI. Experienced in API documentation (Swagger/OpenAPI), authentication (JWT / OAuth), and production deployments. Passionate about AI, ML, and modern web architectures.

highlights: Developed responsive UI components using React, Next.js, and Tailwind CSS.
Integrated APIs and handled authentication with NextAuth and JWT.
Collaborated with Agile teams using GitHub and contributed to projects like CWHR AI, EpicMinds Official Website, and Smart Go.

projects.name: YouTube Clone
projects.about: A responsive YouTube interface clone built to replicate the platform‚Äôs visual layout and user experience. Implements dynamic grid layout, theme toggling, and video thumbnail hover animations to simulate the YouTube UI. üé•

projects.name: Study Buddy AI
projects.about: An AI-driven learning app that allows users to upload PDFs, chat with the content, and auto-generate quizzes for smarter learning. Features context-aware QA, persistent session history, and quiz scoring using RAG-based question generation. üìöü§ñ

projects.name: SpamShield Sentiment Analysis of YouTube Comments
projects.about: Analyzes YouTube comments to detect spam and sentiment using natural language processing and ML models. Generates visual summaries for comment polarity and identifies spammy patterns for content moderation. üß†üìä

projects.name: Portfolio Website
projects.about: A sleek personal portfolio showcasing all projects, experience, and contact details. Built with Next.js and Framer Motion for smooth animations, responsive layouts, and a clean dark/light theme toggle. üíº‚ú®

projects.name: Earthquake Visualizer
projects.about: A responsive web app that visualizes global earthquake data on interactive maps using live API feeds. Provides insights into seismic activity with chart-based analytics and geolocation markers. üåçüìà
